column4: Hello, im in the process of installing compiz fusion and at this point it says "Now you just have to log off, log into your Xgl session and run Compiz Fusion." what does this mean?
right click options at login and choose gnome w/ XGL
I think so.. I don't understand the command to get the cube effect...
im there... im looking at the desktop zoom it says <super> button 3.. what does this mean?
